string.name: name
string.value: Mike at the Perion Dungeon Entrance
#p1040000# seems to find it difficult to believe that a puppet could be making the Mushrooms act so strange. Talk to #b#p1040000##k.
#p1040000#, while still doubtful, asks that you warn #b#p1040001##k at the #b#m106000300##k since this can happen in other places as well.

Hmm... This seems doubtful but a Guard should always be prepared for even the smallest chance of danger. I better warn the other towns too. Evan, if you're not too busy, do you think you could help me out?

Gee, thanks! Please go to #m102000000# and tell #p1040001#, the Guard in charge of the #b#m106000300##k, this official notice. #bHigh level of possibilities for unprecedented phenomenon occuring in monster forces near towns. Observation requested!#k
Oh, are you busy? All right then. I wonder if there is anyone that is headed to #m102000000#... Let me know if you change your mind.

Yawn...snore...wha..what? Yes sir! Atten-hut! No problems to report sir! Wait... I mean... You're just an adventurer. Huh? #p1040000# asked you to come here? What is it?
#b#L0#High rate of people for...#l
#L1#High level of possibilites for...#l
#L2#High chances of feasibility for...#l
#k

High level of possibilities for? For what? Is there a problem?
#b#L0#unprecedented phenomon occuring in monster forces near town#l
#L1#unprecedented dancing of monster forces near town#l
#L2#unprecedented lullabies being sung by monsters near town#l
#k

Unprecedented phenomenon? So... What am I supposed to do?

#b#L0#Dance lessons requested!#l
#L1#Singing lessons requested!#l
#L2#Observation requested!#l
#k
I see. Tell me the details. What's been happening in #m100000000#?
Huh? Puppets are influencing monster behavior? Strange. Okay. There are no problems now, but I will let you know if something happens.
High rate of people for what? Are a lot of people getting sick? What? No?
Chance of feasibility? What are you talking about? Can you just cut to the chase and tell me what #p1040000# wants to tell me?
The monsters are dancing? Are they bored?
If the monsters are singing lullabies, just sing along with them... Stop talking nonsense and tell me what's going on.
You want me to teach the monsters how to dance? What the heck are you talking about?
You want me to teach the monsters how to sing? Oh, my. I'm a terrible singer...
Have you not gone to #m102000000# yet? There is a portal in #m102000000# that leads to the Dungeon. Once you enter the portal, just keep going straight until you see #b#p1040001##k.
